description: Complications for notification counts for WhatsApp, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Outlook, K9 Mail, Google Voice, Twitter, Instagram and Threads!
changelog:
- Added Outlook Complication
- Added K9 Mail Complication
- Added Google Voice Complication
- Added new WhatsApp Complication, widget based, replacing the badge one. The badge one will still work, but will be removed in a future release
